name: Arun Prakash
title: Founder & CEO
about: Arun Prakash, widely known as 'T-Man' for his deep passion for technology, is the Founder & CEO of GUVI Geek Network. With over 20 years of experience in top tech companies like Honeywell, PayPal, Kalido, and Symantec, he has been instrumental in democratizing tech skills globally through GUVI. Under his leadership, GUVI evolved over a decade of dedicated work, inspired by the late co-founder Ms. Sridevi Arunprakash, to become a leading startup in the EdTech industry.
achievements: Led GUVI to achieve two Guinness World Records for AI coding lessons and online programming participation
Invited to Oxford University in 2024 to speak on 'How Vernacular learning is transforming Technology learning'
Recognized as a Youth Icon at the IYONS International Summit
Awarded Leading Social Entrepreneur Award by Action for India in 2019
GUVI awarded 'Most Trusted Vernacular EduTech Award' by ZEE Digital
quote: Technology should be accessible to everyone, regardless of language or background.

name: Sivaraja Ramanathan
title: Chief Executive Officer
about: Sivaraja Ramanathan is the Chief Executive Officer of StartupTN, an initiative by the Government of Tamil Nadu to foster and support the startup ecosystem across the state. With a strong background in entrepreneurship development and ecosystem building, he has been instrumental in creating policies, programs, and networks that empower startups and innovators in Tamil Nadu.
achievements: Leading StartupTN to strengthen Tamil Nadu’s startup ecosystem and innovation culture
Played a key role in supporting and funding numerous startups across sectors
Spearheaded government initiatives to position Tamil Nadu as a leading startup hub
Actively engaged in creating collaborations between startups, investors, and industry
Recognized for contributions in fostering entrepreneurship and job creation

name: Mr. Kandasamy S
title: District Collector
organization: Erode District, Government of Tamil Nadu
about: Mr. Kandasamy S, IAS, is a dedicated civil servant with a distinguished career in public administration across Tamil Nadu. With academic qualifications in textile technology, computer science, Tamil literature, and public administration, he brings a rare blend of technical expertise and administrative acumen. Over the years, he has served in multiple key positions including Deputy Collector, RDO, DRO, Commissioner of Avadi Corporation, and State Programme Manager for the National Health Mission. Known for his hands-on governance, people-centric initiatives, and focus on effective service delivery, he assumed charge as the District Collector of Erode in June 2025, where he continues to work towards inclusive development, efficient governance, and social welfare.
achievements: Managed multiple key administrative positions across Tamil Nadu
Recognized for contributions to effective district-level governance
Coordinated public welfare and development programs in various districts

name: Poongumaran Panneerselvam
title: Managing Director
about: Poongumaran Panneerselvam is the Managing Director of TICEL Biopark Ltd, Chennai. With extensive experience in leadership and industrial development, he focuses on fostering biotechnology innovation and creating a strong ecosystem for research, startups, and enterprises in the life sciences sector.
achievements: Leading TICEL Biopark’s initiatives in biotechnology and life sciences
Played a key role in fostering an ecosystem for biotech startups and research institutions
Contributed to strengthening collaboration between industry, academia, and government
Directed infrastructure development projects supporting biotech innovation

name: Kannan Hari
title: Founder
about: Kannan Hari is the Co-founder and Founder of Palm Era Foods, a company specializing in palm-based natural sweeteners and sustainable food products. With a focus on replacing refined sugar with healthier alternatives, he is driving innovation in the food sector while promoting sustainability and wellness for modern consumers.
achievements: Developed palm-based natural sweetener products as a healthy sugar alternative
Introduced sustainable production methods in food processing
Built Palm Era Foods into a recognized brand in the health & wellness segment
Promoted awareness about sustainable and natural food choices through industry talks
quote: The country's economy grows only when villages grow.

name: Siranjeevi Ramdoss
title: Chief executive officer
about: Siranjeevi Ramdoss is a corporate leader active across multiple ventures in technology and general business domains. He holds leadership roles such as Director and Designated Partner in companies focused on digital solutions and brand development.
achievements: Founded and scaled PiBi Technologies as a leading AI-driven solutions provider in Tamil Nadu.
Developed a unique 90-day AI adoption framework that ensures businesses achieve ROI rapidly.
Helped multiple companies automate workflows using intelligent agents, reducing operational costs significantly.

name: Mr. Vinoth Rajendran
title: Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
organization: TCE Technology Business Incubator (TCE TBI), Thiagarajar College of Engineering
about: Mr. Vinoth Rajendran is the Chief Executive Officer of the TCE Technology Business Incubator (TCE TBI) at Thiagarajar College of Engineering. As an innovation enabler and ecosystem builder, he plays a pivotal role in nurturing and scaling early-stage startups, guiding them through ideation, incubation, and commercialisation. Known for his commitment to fostering entrepreneurial growth within academia, he frequently participates in seminars and institutions, empowering students and startups through strategic mentorship and incubation support.
achievements: Appointed CEO of TCE Technology Business Incubator (TCE TBI)
Active speaker at academic events nurturing startups and innovation
Key contributor to ecosystem-building initiatives at Thiagarajar College of Engineering

name: Umasankaran P
title: Founder & CEO
organization: Startup News Tamil & Free Famous Food
about: Umasankaran P is the Founder and CEO of Startup News Tamil and Free Famous Food. With a strong presence in both media and food ventures, he focuses on building impactful platforms that empower entrepreneurs and deliver authentic culinary experiences. His dual leadership reflects innovation, communication, and a vision for community-driven growth.
achievements: Founded Startup News Tamil, a platform dedicated to covering and promoting startup stories in the Tamil ecosystem
Established Free Famous Food to deliver authentic and popular food experiences
Created a bridge between entrepreneurship and media through impactful storytelling
Contributed to promoting local businesses and emerging startups
Recognized as an entrepreneur balancing both digital media and F&B ventures
quote: Stories have the power to inspire change — Startup News Tamil is built to tell those stories in the language of the people.

name: Dr. G.S. Mahalakshmi
title: Director
organization: Centre for Entrepreneurship Development, Anna University
about: Dr. G.S. Mahalakshmi is an Associate Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering (DCSE) at Anna University and serves as the Director of the Centre for Entrepreneurship Development. With a strong academic background (B.E., M.E., Ph.D.), she mentors AI/ML startups and plays a pivotal role in fostering entrepreneurial innovation within academia.
achievements: Serving as Director of the Centre for Entrepreneurship Development at Anna University
Associate Professor in DCSE, actively contributing to engineering education and research
Mentoring AI/ML startups through academic and innovation programs

name: K. Suresh Kumar
title: Executive Director
about: K. Suresh Kumar is the Executive Director of PSG-STEP (PSG-Science & Technology Entrepreneurial Park). He is a strong advocate of innovation, entrepreneurship, and technology-driven development, playing a vital role in nurturing startups and fostering entrepreneurial ecosystems in Tamil Nadu. His leadership has significantly contributed to enabling students, innovators, and entrepreneurs to convert ideas into successful ventures.
achievements: Led PSG-STEP in supporting and incubating numerous startups across technology domains
Contributed to creating a sustainable entrepreneurial ecosystem in Tamil Nadu
Guided innovators and students to transform their ideas into scalable ventures
Recognized for promoting innovation and entrepreneurship at academic and industrial levels
Actively involved in mentoring, funding access, and networking opportunities for startups
quote: Empowering startups through mentorship, infrastructure, and innovation.

name: Sezhian Bharathi
title: Corporate Trainer
about: Sezhian Bharathi is a philosopher and corporate trainer who specializes in relationship coaching. As a co-founder of the Cromulents Academy for Realistic Education based in Coimbatore, he works to bridge analytical thinking with practical life skills, empowering individuals and organizations through coaching and philosophical insight.
achievements: Co-founded the Cromulents Academy for Realistic Education to offer transformative coaching and training
Delivered corporate training and workshops rooted in philosophical frameworks and practical application
Recognized for combining philosophical depth with actionable strategies in personal and professional growth
Championed realistic, education-based approaches to self-awareness and interpersonal development

name: Vinoth Kumar Chandran
title: Director
about: Vinoth Kumar Chandran is the Director of Bipolar Factory Private Limited, a creative and technology-driven company specializing in innovative digital solutions. He focuses on bridging the gap between creativity and business by driving impactful projects that combine design, technology, and strategy. With his leadership, the company has positioned itself as a dynamic player in the digital and creative industries.
achievements: Directed growth initiatives that strengthened Bipolar Factory’s position in the market
Led innovative projects combining technology and creativity for diverse industries
Introduced new-age solutions driving business impact and brand visibility
Recognized for steering Bipolar Factory towards sustainable and scalable growth
quote: The true future of healthcare lies at the intersection of compassion and cutting-edge technology.

name: Kalai Kathiravan
title: Managing Partner | Founder, Director & CEO
organization: Lemurian Bazaar | Lemurian Ventures Private Limited
about: Kalai Kathiravan is the Managing Partner, Founder, Director, and CEO of Lemurian Bazaar and Lemurian Ventures Private Limited. With a strong vision for innovation and entrepreneurship, he focuses on building sustainable business ecosystems and creating growth opportunities across multiple sectors. His leadership emphasizes modern business strategies, cultural preservation, and global market expansion.
achievements: Founded Lemurian Bazaar, promoting cultural and traditional products in modern markets
Established Lemurian Ventures Pvt Ltd to support and scale innovative business ideas
Created opportunities for entrepreneurs and artisans through e-commerce platforms
Actively contributes to business networks and entrepreneurial ecosystem development
quote: From a small village to national markets, my mission is to prove that traditional products can thrive in the modern economy without losing their authenticity.

name: Mr. R.K. Kanthimathinathan
title: Founder
about: Mr. R.K. Kanthimathinathan, fondly known as Kanthi, is the Founder of Theme Group of Companies and a dynamic entrepreneur with over 30 years of software industry experience. He was instrumental in conceptualizing, forming, and successfully operating Encore Theme since 2006 until its acquisition by Wipro in 2019. Within just five years of incorporation, he positioned Encore Theme as a trusted player in the Banking and Financial Services space, both in domestic and international markets. Today, Kanthi continues his entrepreneurial journey through ventures in retail, apparel exports, and food products while also serving as a social entrepreneur, heading Theme Champs Consulting Services and RKK Goshala. His vision remains focused on transforming Theme Group from a mid-sized company into a large, successful enterprise.
achievements: Founded Theme Group of Companies
Successfully led Encore Theme from inception (2006) to acquisition by Wipro (2019)
Built Encore Theme into an established BFSI solutions provider in 5 years
Recognized by Business India Magazine as one of the youngest successful executives
Guided Theme Group across Finance, Banking, Retail, Garments & Food sectors
Recognition from CEO Magazine – 'Top 25 Emerging Companies'
Recognition from CIO Review India – 'Top 20 Financial Solution Providers of 2017'
Trophy awarded by SBI Chairman Arundhati Bhattacharya for fastest global trade finance solution implementation
industry: Technology, BFSI Solutions, Retail, Food & Social Entrepreneurship

name: Senthil Kumar Murugesan
title: CEO & Co-Founder
about: Senthil Kumar Murugesan is a visionary entrepreneur and CEO & Co-Founder of JioVio Healthcare (Savemom Pvt Ltd), based in Madurai, Tamil Nadu, India. With over 13 years of experience in the tech industry, he is a passionate innovator dedicated to leveraging technology to solve real-life problems. A prolific technology inventor, Senthil holds more than 10 granted patents and has pioneered AI-enabled IoT solutions to tackle maternal and infant healthcare challenges.
achievements: Founded JioVio Healthcare (Savemom Pvt Ltd), creating AI-enabled IoT kits to reduce maternal and infant mortality
Innovation featured as a design thinking case study at Harvard Business School
Holds 10+ granted patents in technology and healthcare
Named among the Top 5 Technology Explorers in India by NASSCOM
Represented India at the Battlemesh Research Programme in Europe
Delivered 180+ guest lectures across higher education institutes in India
Winner of multiple national and international hackathons
Worked at Fortune 500 companies Samsung and Qualcomm before founding his startup
quote: Innovation is not just about solving problems — it’s about creating sustainable impact for generations to come.

name: Santhos Premraj
title: Co-Founder & Head of Product
about: Santhos Premraj is the Co-Founder and Head of Product at Ticket9, a platform dedicated to simplifying event ticketing and audience engagement. With a strong focus on product design, technology integration, and customer experience, he plays a key role in building innovative solutions for event organizers and participants. His leadership blends entrepreneurial drive with a passion for user-centric products.
achievements: Co-founded Ticket9, revolutionizing event ticketing and engagement solutions
Contributed to Ticket9’s recognition in the startup ecosystem
Played a vital role in expanding Ticket9’s reach across multiple events and industries
Known for integrating technology-driven solutions to simplify audience engagement
quote: Building a product with real scenes in SaaS is no small feat; it underscores the complexity and depth of the process!

name: Premkumar M
title: Industry Expert, Leadership Thinker & Mentor, Angel Investor
about: Premkumar M is a seasoned leader, mentor, and angel investor with over 35 years of corporate experience across India, the USA, and Thailand. Known for his expertise in strategy, operations, supply chain, lean transformation, and leadership, Prem has played pivotal roles in guiding startups and enterprises. He is deeply committed to fostering entrepreneurship through mentorship, angel investing, and thought leadership.
achievements: Over 35 years of leadership experience in India, USA, and Thailand
Member of Campus Angels Network, Chennai
Charter Member of TiE Coimbatore, actively mentoring Startups & MSMEs
Certified Lean Coach and global mentor with TiE
Visiting faculty at reputed management institutes
Alumnus of Madras Institute of Technology – Anna University
Alumnus of IIM Bangalore with multiple gold medals
Recognized for blending cultural insights with leadership and coaching expertise
quote: True leadership lies in mentoring others and enabling sustainable growth through strategy, culture, and innovation.

name: Dinesh K Sundaravelu
title: CEO
about: Dinesh K Sundaravelu is the CEO of TN Research Parks Foundation (TIDCO). With a strong background in public service innovation and startup ecosystem development, he has played key roles in enabling research-driven growth and fostering entrepreneurship. As a Chevening CRISP Fellow 2025-26 and former leader at StartupTN, he brings global perspectives and strategic expertise to advancing research parks and innovation clusters in Tamil Nadu.
achievements: Appointed CEO of TN Research Parks Foundation under TIDCO, driving innovation and research-led growth
Selected as Chevening CRISP Fellow 2025-26, representing India on a global leadership platform
Contributed significantly to building and strengthening Tamil Nadu’s startup ecosystem during his tenure at StartupTN
Recognized for fostering industry-academia collaboration to support entrepreneurs and innovators
Driving initiatives to position Tamil Nadu as a hub for research, innovation, and technology-based ventures

name: Anusha V
title: Founder and CEO
about: Anusha V is the Founder and CEO of Narchuvai Foods, a brand dedicated to offering authentic, healthy, and traditional food products. She focuses on bringing back native flavors with a modern approach, ensuring quality, taste, and nutrition in every product. Her entrepreneurial journey reflects a passion for food innovation and sustainable business practices in the food industry.
achievements: Founded Narchuvai Foods with a mission to preserve and promote traditional flavors
Developed a range of healthy and authentic food products catering to modern consumers
Built a brand identity centered around trust, quality, and innovation
Established Narchuvai Foods as a growing name in the healthy food industry
quote: Narchuvai, a name that shows my deep love for preserving age-old culinary wisdom. I picked this name to share the richness of taste and bring people closer to our traditional flavors!

name: Iswaryaa G P
title: Chief Content & Growth Strategist | Content Creator
about: Iswaryaa G P is the Chief Content & Growth Strategist at TownScholar. With expertise in content creation, brand storytelling, and growth strategies, she focuses on developing impactful content that drives brand engagement, community growth, and thought leadership in the digital space.
achievements: Spearheaded strategic growth initiatives at TownScholar, resulting in improved user engagement and platform visibility.
Created high-impact content for digital platforms that increased audience retention and brand recall.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to align content initiatives with overall business goals.
Recognized for thought leadership in brand storytelling and innovative approaches to content-driven growth.
quote: The skills that got you here might not be the ones that take you further.

name: Yuvarani Balakrishnan
title: Chief Executive Officer
about: Yuvarani Balakrishnan is the Chief Executive Officer of Dailikart Soft Tech. With a strong background in technology and management, she focuses on driving digital transformation, business growth, and innovative solutions in the IT services sector.
achievements: Founded and scaled Dailikart Soft Tech into a growing technology services company
Led multiple successful digital transformation projects for clients
Recognized for leadership in combining technology with business growth
Contributed to creating sustainable IT-based solutions for enterprises

name: Sreeja Mohan
title: Founder and CEO
about: Sreeja Mohan is the Founder and CEO of My Peeli, a brand dedicated to promoting sustainable and eco-friendly products. With a passion for innovation and conscious consumerism, she leads the company in creating solutions that blend sustainability, design, and everyday utility.
achievements: Founded My Peeli to promote eco-conscious and sustainable living
Introduced innovative products designed with a focus on environmental responsibility
Recognized as a leader driving eco-friendly initiatives in consumer goods
Built a growing brand that aligns business with sustainability goals
quote: Creativity is not just an art—it’s a strategy. At My Peeli, we turn stories into experiences that outlive campaigns.

name: Vaishnavi Rajalakshmi S
title: CEO & Managing Director
organization: The Gaia Sustainable Solutions Pvt Ltd & Zorg Corp Business consultation Pvt Ltd
about: Vaishnavi Rajalakshmi S is the CEO & Managing Director of The Gaia Sustainable Solutions Pvt Ltd and Zorg Corp Business Consultation Pvt Ltd. With a strong commitment to sustainability and business innovation, she leads initiatives that promote eco-friendly solutions, sustainable business practices, and strategic consulting to help organizations thrive responsibly.
achievements: Founded and scaled The Gaia Sustainable Solutions Pvt Ltd with a focus on eco-friendly initiatives
Established Zorg Corp Business Consultation Pvt Ltd to provide strategic guidance for business growth
Promoted sustainability-driven innovation in corporate and entrepreneurial ecosystems
Empowered startups and enterprises with consultation on growth and sustainability models
quote: Remember childrens do learn. but they copy us.

name: Dhivya Bharathi
title: Founder
about: Dhivya Bharathi is the Founder of Uzhamagal, a venture focused on promoting traditional, cultural, and sustainable practices through innovative solutions. She is passionate about empowering communities and creating awareness about eco-conscious living and heritage preservation.
achievements: Founded Uzhamagal to preserve and promote cultural and sustainable practices
Developed initiatives to support eco-friendly and traditional lifestyles
Built a platform that bridges heritage values with modern entrepreneurial approaches
Inspired awareness about sustainable living through innovative ventures
quote: I grew up with the ideology to break it and overcome it.

name: Kasiraja Thangapandian
title: Global Director, Software Engineering
about: Kasiraja Thangapandian serves as the Global Director of Engineering IT Software at Visteon Corporation. With a proven track record in engineering leadership, he specializes in developing scalable software solutions, driving global IT initiatives, and leading high-performance teams to deliver next-generation automotive technology solutions.
achievements: Led global engineering IT software initiatives across multiple regions
Played a pivotal role in advancing digital transformation strategies within Visteon
Managed large-scale engineering IT operations with global teams
Recognized for leadership in building scalable and efficient IT systems
quote: Driving engineering excellence through automated, efficient, and reliable software delivery.

name: K. T. Srinivasa Raja
title: Managing Director
about: K. T. Srinivasa Raja is the Managing Director of Adyar Ananda Bhavan (A2B), one of India’s most renowned chains of vegetarian restaurants and sweet shops. Under his leadership, A2B has expanded across India and abroad, becoming a household name for authentic South Indian cuisine, traditional sweets, and quality service. He is widely recognized for blending tradition with modern business practices to grow A2B into a trusted brand.
achievements: Expanded Adyar Ananda Bhavan (A2B) into one of the largest vegetarian restaurant and sweets chains in India
Established international outlets, taking South Indian cuisine global
Recognized for preserving tradition while adopting modern business models
Built A2B into a trusted household brand with strong customer loyalty
quote: From humble beginnings to a global brand, it’s about preserving tradition while embracing innovation.

name: Prof. Krishnan Balasubramanian
title: Institute Professor & Professor-in-Charge, GDC
about: Prof. Krishnan Balasubramanian is an eminent mechanical engineering scholar and innovation leader at IIT Madras. With a Ph.D. from Drexel University and extensive prior experience at Mississippi State University, he has served as head of the Centre for Nondestructive Evaluation since its inception in 2001 and currently leads the Gopalakrishnan-Deshpande Centre for Innovation & Entrepreneurship (GDC). A distinguished researcher in ultrasonics, non-destructive evaluation, structural health monitoring, and materials characterization, Prof. Balasubramanian has authored hundreds of publications and guided numerous graduate scholars. His leadership extends to mentoring deep-tech startups, fostering startup incubation, and serving on editorial boards of prominent NDE journals.
achievements: Founder & Head – Centre for Nondestructive Evaluation (CNDE), IIT Madras (since 2001)
Professor-in-Charge – Gopalakrishnan-Deshpande Centre for Innovation & Entrepreneurship (GDC)
Over 250 technical publications; hundreds of MS & PhD mentees
Awards include Roy Sharpe Prize, Abdul Kalam Technology Innovation Fellowship, and Lifetime Achievement Award from IIT Madras
Incubated ~10 startups employing 1,100+ professionals across 12 countries
Former Dean of Industrial Consulting & Sponsored Research (2012-18)

name: Dr. Bijay Kumar Sahu
title: Senior Regional Manager & Program Head (East)
organization: National Research Development Corporation (NRDC), Govt. of India
about: Dr. Bijay Kumar Sahu is the Senior Regional Manager & Program Head (East), recognized for his leadership in driving regional development initiatives and fostering innovation-led programs. With extensive experience in managing projects and collaborating with industries, academia, and startups, he plays a pivotal role in enabling growth and strengthening ecosystems across the eastern region of India.
achievements: Spearheaded multiple regional programs supporting startups and innovation ecosystems
Strengthened industry-academia partnerships for skill development and technology adoption
Played a key role in implementing development strategies in Eastern India
Mentored startups and entrepreneurs in scaling their ventures
Recognized for impactful leadership in regional innovation and growth initiatives
quote: Innovation thrives where intellectual property acts as a bridge between academia, industry, and societal impact.
